definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְתוּב]], c. [[עַל]] pers., of brightness ([[זִיו]]) of face Da 4:33 b, of knowledge v:Da 4:31, v:Da 4:33 a.

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הֲתִיב]] Da 2:14; 3 mpl. sf. [[הֲתִיבוּנׇא]] Ezr 5:11; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יַהֲתִיבוּן]] Ezr 6:5, [[יְתִיבוּן]] (K:§ 33, 2) Ezr 5:5; Inf. sf. [[לַהֲתָבוּתָח]] Da 3:16;—
return (acc. of answer, etc.) Ezr 5:5, Ezr 5:11, Da 3:16 (sf. Pers.), ´[[עֵטָא וּטְעֵם הֲת]]: Da 2:14.
